DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , multi-center study evaluate everlinQ endoAVF System use create endovascular arteriovenous fistula ( endoAVF ) patient require vascular access hemodialysis .
DOC.criteria: Adult ( age > 18 year old ) Established , nonreversible kidney failure require hemodialysis ( stage 4 5 renal disease ) include predialysis patient Both radial ulnar artery flow hand Known central venous stenosis central vein narrow > 50 % Occlusion stenosis > 50 % target cannulation cephalic basilic vein Significantly compromise ( ≥50 % stenosis ) flow treatment arm Documented ejection fraction ( EF ) ≤35 % last 6 month Pregnant woman New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) class III IV heart failure Hypercoagulable state Known bleeding diathesis Known allergy contrast dye adequately premedicated Known adverse effect sedation and/or anesthesia adequately premedicated
